trans-unit.source: Azure AD Connect: Ports | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Azure AD Connect: Ports | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: This page is a technical reference page for ports that are required to be open for Azure AD Connect
trans-unit.target: This page is a technical reference page for ports that are required to be open for Azure AD Connect

trans-unit.source: Hybrid Identity Required Ports and Protocols
trans-unit.target: Hybrid Identity Required Ports and Protocols

trans-unit.source: The following document is a technical reference to provide information on the required ports and protocols that are required for implementing a hybrid identity solution.
trans-unit.target: The following document is a technical reference to provide information on the required ports and protocols that are required for implementing a hybrid identity solution.

trans-unit.source: Use the illustration below and refer to the corresponding table.
trans-unit.target: Use the illustration below and refer to the corresponding table.

trans-unit.source: Table 1 - Azure AD Connect and On-premises AD
trans-unit.target: Table 1 - Azure AD Connect and On-premises AD

trans-unit.source: This table describes the ports and protocols that are required for communication between the Azure AD Connect server and on-premises AD.
trans-unit.target: This table describes the ports and protocols that are required for communication between the Azure AD Connect server and on-premises AD.

trans-unit.source: DNS lookups on the destination forest.
trans-unit.target: DNS lookups on the destination forest.

trans-unit.source: Kerberos authentication to the AD forest.
trans-unit.target: Kerberos authentication to the AD forest.

trans-unit.source: Used during the initial configuration of the Azure AD Connect wizard when it binds to the AD forest.
trans-unit.target: Used during the initial configuration of the Azure AD Connect wizard when it binds to the AD forest.

trans-unit.source: Used for data import from AD.
trans-unit.target: Used for data import from AD.

trans-unit.source: Data is encrypted with Kerberos Sign & Seal.
trans-unit.target: Data is encrypted with Kerberos Sign & Seal.

trans-unit.source: Used for data import from AD.
trans-unit.target: Used for data import from AD.

trans-unit.source: The data transfer is signed and encrypted.
trans-unit.target: The data transfer is signed and encrypted.

trans-unit.source: Only used if you are using SSL.
trans-unit.target: Only used if you are using SSL.

trans-unit.source: Used during the initial configuration of Azure AD Connect when it binds to the AD forests.
trans-unit.target: Used during the initial configuration of Azure AD Connect when it binds to the AD forests.

trans-unit.source: Table 2 - Azure AD Connect and Azure AD
trans-unit.target: Table 2 - Azure AD Connect and Azure AD

trans-unit.source: This table describes the ports and protocols that are required for communication between the Azure AD Connect server and Azure AD.
trans-unit.target: This table describes the ports and protocols that are required for communication between the Azure AD Connect server and Azure AD.

trans-unit.source: Used to download CRLs (Certificate Revocation Lists) to verify SSL certificates.
trans-unit.target: Used to download CRLs (Certificate Revocation Lists) to verify SSL certificates.

trans-unit.source: Used to synchronize with Azure AD.
trans-unit.target: Used to synchronize with Azure AD.

trans-unit.source: For a list of Office 365 ports and IP address see [Office 365 URLs and IP address ranges.](https://support.office.com/article/Office-365-URLs-and-IP-address-ranges-8548a211-3fe7-47cb-abb1-355ea5aa88a2)
trans-unit.target: For a list of Office 365 ports and IP address see [Office 365 URLs and IP address ranges.](https://support.office.com/article/Office-365-URLs-and-IP-address-ranges-8548a211-3fe7-47cb-abb1-355ea5aa88a2)

trans-unit.source: Table 3 - Azure AD Connect and Federation Servers/WAP
trans-unit.target: Table 3 - Azure AD Connect and Federation Servers/WAP

trans-unit.source: This table describes the ports and protocols that are required for communication between the Azure AD Connect server and Federation/WAP servers.
trans-unit.target: This table describes the ports and protocols that are required for communication between the Azure AD Connect server and Federation/WAP servers.

trans-unit.source: Used to download CRLs (Certificate Revocation Lists) to verify SSL certificates.
trans-unit.target: Used to download CRLs (Certificate Revocation Lists) to verify SSL certificates.

trans-unit.source: Used to synchronize with Azure AD.
trans-unit.target: Used to synchronize with Azure AD.

trans-unit.source: This table describes the ports and protocols that are required for communication between the Federation servers and WAP servers.
trans-unit.target: This table describes the ports and protocols that are required for communication between the Federation servers and WAP servers.

trans-unit.source: This table describes the ports and protocols that are required for communication between users and the WAP servers.
trans-unit.target: This table describes the ports and protocols that are required for communication between users and the WAP servers.

trans-unit.source: Table 6a & 6b - Azure AD Connect Health agent for (AD FS/Sync) and Azure AD
trans-unit.target: Table 6a & 6b - Azure AD Connect Health agent for (AD FS/Sync) and Azure AD

trans-unit.source: The following tables describe the endpoints, ports and protocols that are required for communication between Azure AD Connect Health agents and Azure AD
trans-unit.target: The following tables describe the endpoints, ports and protocols that are required for communication between Azure AD Connect Health agents and Azure AD

trans-unit.source: Table 6a - Ports and Protocols for Azure AD Connect Health agent for (AD FS/Sync) and Azure AD
trans-unit.target: Table 6a - Ports and Protocols for Azure AD Connect Health agent for (AD FS/Sync) and Azure AD

trans-unit.source: This table describes the following outbound ports and protocols that are required for communication between the Azure AD Connect Health agents and Azure AD.
trans-unit.target: This table describes the following outbound ports and protocols that are required for communication between the Azure AD Connect Health agents and Azure AD.

trans-unit.source: 6b - Endpoints for Azure AD Connect Health agent for (AD FS/Sync) and Azure AD
trans-unit.target: 6b - Endpoints for Azure AD Connect Health agent for (AD FS/Sync) and Azure AD
